title: Enhancements (AI Tools)
description: Editing-focused utilities that improve or repair an image (not a 'style' category).

children.title: Smart Crowd Removal
children.description: Removes unwanted people/background clutter while keeping the scene looking natural.

metadata.title: Smart Crowd Removal Tool
metadata.description: Removes unwanted people from background while keeping scene natural.

children.title: Upscaling
children.description: Increases resolution and detail for sharper large-format exports while preserving natural textures.

metadata.title: AI Upscaling Tool
metadata.description: Increases resolution while preserving natural textures.

children.title: Restoration
children.description: Repairs older or damaged images (scratches, noise, fading) while keeping a believable result.

metadata.title: AI Restoration Tool
metadata.description: Repairs damaged images while keeping believable results.
